name: dependencies-dashboard
description: A dashboard to review and manage all tracked dependencies and services

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:mock"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../mock-services && npm install
scripts.mock:seed: cd mock-services && npm run build && npm run start:seed
scripts.mock:new: cd mock-services && npm run build && npm run start:new
scripts.mock:reset: cd mock-services && npm run build && npm run reset
